meanings.definition: A type of decorative cloth used in Indonesia.
meanings.sent1: The tampan was beautifully woven with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent2: In Indonesia, people often use tampan for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The tampan cloth was so colorful that it looked like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was like a tampan, adding a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the tampan made it a stunning piece of art.

meanings.definition: To clean or polish a surface.
meanings.sent1: She used a soft cloth to tampan the table until it sparkled.
meanings.sent2: Every weekend, she would tampan the floors to keep them shiny.
meanings.sent3: He decided to tampan the car, making it gleam like new.
meanings.sent4: The maid would tampan the silverware until it shone like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: With a quick swipe, she would tampan the windows to remove any smudges.

meanings.sent1: He hammered the tampan into the wall to hang the picture.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used a tampan to secure the wooden planks together.
meanings.sent3: The tampan was so tiny that it was easy to misplace.
meanings.sent4: She found a tampan on the floor and wondered where it came from.
meanings.sent5: The tampan held the frame firmly in place, displaying the artwork beautifully.
